personal_info.summary: QA Manual and Systems Analyst with experience in customer service, emergency dispatch, and office administration. Proven ability to resolve problems, work under pressure, and manage teams in dynamic environments. Currently pursuing a Bachelor's degree in Data Science and enhancing skills in Full Stack development with Python. Seeking remote or in-person opportunities to apply QA and analytical skills, with a focus on data-driven solutions. Open to TRAINNER and entry-level positions.

responsibilities: Managed emergency situations and coordinated national patient transfers, resulting in a 15% improvement in response times.
Implemented a new system for tracking patient transfers, increasing efficiency by 20%.
Trained new dispatchers on emergency protocols and QA procedures, achieving 100% compliance.
Conducted quality assurance checks on dispatch logs, ensuring accuracy and compliance with regulations.
Provided excellent customer service to individuals in distress, maintaining composure under pressure.
Coordinated PAMI patient transfers, streamlining the process and reducing wait times by 10%.
Provided customer support for Claro 611, resolving an average of 50 customer issues per day.
Supervised a team of 5 customer service representatives during peak periods, ensuring service quality.
Trained new hires on customer service procedures and QA protocols, improving first call resolution by 10%.
Conducted regular QA checks on call recordings, identifying areas for improvement and providing feedback to team members.
Implemented a new system for tracking customer complaints, reducing resolution times by 15%.
Successfully handled escalated customer issues, achieving a 90% customer satisfaction rating.
Managed all office administrative tasks, including data entry, filing, and scheduling, increasing office efficiency by 20%.
Migrated paper-based database to a digital system, improving data accuracy by 15% and reducing retrieval time by 50%.
Managed and maintained office IT equipment, ensuring smooth operation and minimal downtime.
Implemented new filing system for client records, improving organization and retrieval time by 25%.
Trained staff on new software and database usage, ensuring successful adoption and improved productivity.
Developed and implemented new office procedures, streamlining operations and reducing administrative costs by 10%.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Data Science (In Progress)
